name: Heroes of Camlann
description:
Heroes of Camlann is an early  prototype for a singleplayer game where you must defend Camelot against invaders and mythic beasts.

The game is similar to Yatzee : You roll 5x dice up to three times and try to use them to fulfill the mission you have selected.

You have 10 days to protect Camelot from the invader and find the Graal.

 Good luck !
